column5: I am not sure if this has been posted here or not yet, but it can't hurt.  It almost seems like every day we learn of another fallen soldier from the hostile territories near Kandahar.  If you get a moment, go to the following link and post a message to convey the respect, support, and appreciation we have for the courageous Canadian troops.  http://www.forces.gc.ca/site/community/mes...ard/index_e.asp   Tony
Thanks for the link Tony.  Cheers, 1leg
BUMP! Everyone should write a little something.
